uk.co.mccann.socialpeek
Class SocialPeekConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.mccann.socialpeek.SocialPeekConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable
public class SocialPeekConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configurable

SocialPeekConfiguration configuration required for each instance of SocialPeek, contains registered services and return data type

Dave Shanley

setServiceType

public void setServiceType(java.lang.Class<SocialService> serviceType)
Set the social service you want the generator to process, this can be any of the following:

TwitterService.class : Get information from Twitter DeliciousService.class : Get information from del.ico.us DiggService.class : Get information from Digg TechnoratiService.class : Get information from Technorati WeFeelFineService.class : Get information from We Feel Fine RSSService.class : Get information from a user defined RSS feed. RandomService.class : Get information from a random service

Parameters:
serviceType - the class of the service
